text: <!channel>: updates from Beam:  Cables were installed in the basement. Let me know if you have any feedback for Beam! Exhaust fans in the bathroom to be installed in the next 2 weeks. Tamper-resistant nuts for the downstairs racks are on order and should be in late this month or early next.
I've never been so excited to read the words "exhaust fan" in my life.
yaaaay! thanks for doing all the legwork melissa! i'll be sure to try out the basement cables tomorrow
